text: "Lights" is a 1978 song by Journey and it was taken from their fourth studio album Infinity. It was released as a single in 1993, as the live version from their box set album TimeÂ³. It went to number 30 on the Billboard Adult Contemporary chart. == References == Category:1978 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Journey (band) songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Lights (Journey song)
